Rules.InvariantScript: Left(Upper(LookUp(Users,'Primary Email'= User().Email).'First Name'),1) & Left(Upper(LookUp(Users,'Primary Email'= User().Email).'Last Name'),1)
Left(Upper(ThisItem.'Order From'.'First Name'),1) & Left(Upper(ThisItem.'Order From'.'Last Name'),1)

If(
    varfiltergallery = true,
   
        If(
            'Sort gallery_4'.Selected.Title = "Newest",
            Sort(
                If(
        'Order List'.Type = "Primary",
        Filter(
            OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
            'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && Text('Created On',"dd/mm/yyyy") = Text(DatePicker1.SelectedDate,"dd/mm/yyyy")
        ),
         'Order List'.Type = "Secondary",
        Filter(
            OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
            'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Secondary && Text('Created On',"dd/mm/yyyy") = Text(DatePicker1.SelectedDate,"dd/mm/yyyy")
        )
        ),
                'Created On',
                SortOrder.Descending
            ),
        // Sort with Oldest-------------------------------------------------
            'Sort gallery_4'.Selected.Title = "Oldest",
            Sort(
                 If(
        'Order List'.Type = "Primary",
        Filter(
            OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
            'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && Text('Created On',"dd/mm/yyyy") = Text(DatePicker1.SelectedDate,"dd/mm/yyyy")
        ),
         'Order List'.Type = "Secondary",
        Filter(
            OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
            'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Secondary && Text('Created On',"dd/mm/yyyy") = Text(DatePicker1.SelectedDate,"dd/mm/yyyy")
        )
        ),
                'Created On',
                SortOrder.Ascending
            ),
        // Sort with Higest to Lowest-------------------------------------------------
            'Sort gallery_4'.Selected.Title = "Highest to Lowest",
            Sort(
                 If(
        'Order List'.Type = "Primary",
        Filter(
            OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
            'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && Text('Created On',"dd/mm/yyyy") = Text(DatePicker1.SelectedDate,"dd/mm/yyyy")
        ),
         'Order List'.Type = "Secondary",
        Filter(
            OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
            'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Secondary && Text('Created On',"dd/mm/yyyy") = Text(DatePicker1.SelectedDate,"dd/mm/yyyy")
        )
        ),
                'Total Bill Amount',
                SortOrder.Descending
            ),
        // Sort with Lowest to Highest-------------------------------------------------
            'Sort gallery_4'.Selected.Title = "Lowest to Highest",
            Sort(
                 If(
        'Order List'.Type = "Primary",
        Filter(
            OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
            'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && Text('Created On',"dd/mm/yyyy") = Text(DatePicker1.SelectedDate,"dd/mm/yyyy")
        ),
         'Order List'.Type = "Secondary",
        Filter(
            OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
            'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Secondary && Text('Created On',"dd/mm/yyyy") = Text(DatePicker1.SelectedDate,"dd/mm/yyyy")
        )
        ),
                'Total Bill Amount',
                SortOrder.Ascending
            )
        ),
        // Custom filter data --------------------------------------------------
    varfiltergallery = false,
    // Sort with Newest-------------------------------------------------
    If(
        'Sort gallery_4'.Selected.Title = "Newest",
        Sort(
            colFilterData,
            'Created On',
            SortOrder.Descending
        ),
        // Sort with Oldest-------------------------------------------------
        'Sort gallery_4'.Selected.Title = "Oldest",
        Sort(
            colFilterData,
            'Created On',
            SortOrder.Ascending
        ),
        // Sort with Higest to Lowest-------------------------------------------------
        'Sort gallery_4'.Selected.Title = "Highest to Lowest",
        Sort(
            colFilterData,
            'Total Bill Amount',
            SortOrder.Descending
        ),
        // Sort with Lowest to Highest-------------------------------------------------
        'Sort gallery_4'.Selected.Title = "Lowest to Highest",
        Sort(
            colFilterData,
            'Total Bill Amount',
            SortOrder.Ascending
        )
    )
)

Filter(
    Users,
    Manager.'Primary Email' = User().Email || 'Primary Email' = User().Email
)

ClearCollect(
    colFilterData,
    If(
        'Order List'.Type = "Primary",
        If(
         //Date selected-----------------------------------------------------------------------
            !IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            If(
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "Today",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    IsToday('Created On') && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Week",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today()))) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Month",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (Text(
                        'Created On',
                        "mmmm"
                    ) = Text(
                        Today(),
                        "mmmm"
                    )) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                )
            ),
        //Party selected-----------------------------------------------------------------------
            IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email' && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary
            ),
        //Status selected-----------------------------------------------------------------------
            IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email' && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary
            ),
        // total order amount ------------------------------------------------------
            IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email' && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary
            ),
        // Selected salesperson-------------------------
            !IsBlank(radioSalesperson_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email' && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary
            ),
        // Date to and date from -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
            !IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && !IsBlank(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
            ),
      // Select date and party------------------------------------------------------------------
            !IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            If(
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "Today",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    IsToday('Created On') && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Week",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today()))) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Month",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (Text(
                        'Created On',
                        "mmmm"
                    ) = Text(
                        Today(),
                        "mmmm"
                    )) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                )
            ),
             // Select date and Status------------------------------------------------------------------
            !IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            If(
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "Today",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    IsToday('Created On') && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Week",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today()))) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Month",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (Text(
                        'Created On',
                        "mmmm"
                    ) = Text(
                        Today(),
                        "mmmm"
                    )) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                )
            ),
        // Select date and order value------------------------------------------------------------------
            !IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            If(
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "Today",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    IsToday('Created On') && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Week",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today()))) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Month",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (Text(
                        'Created On',
                        "mmmm"
                    ) = Text(
                        Today(),
                        "mmmm"
                    )) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                )
            ),
        //Party  and status selected--------------------------------------------------------------
            IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
            ),
         //Party  and order value selected--------------------------------------------------------------
            IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
            ),
        //Party  and date value selected--------------------------------------------------------------
            !IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && !IsBlank(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
            ),
        //Status  and order value selected---------------------------------------------------------
            IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email' && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary
            ),
        //Status  and date value selected--------------------------------------------------------------
            !IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && !IsBlank(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
            ),
    //Party,Status and date selected-------------------------------------------------------------
            !IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            If(
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "Today",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    IsToday('Created On') && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Week",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today()))) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Month",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (Text(
                        'Created On',
                        "mmmm"
                    ) = Text(
                        Today(),
                        "mmmm"
                    )) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                )
            ),
 //Party,ordervalue and date selected-------------------------------------------------------------
            !IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            If(
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "Today",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    IsToday('Created On') && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Week",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today()))) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Month",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (Text(
                        'Created On',
                        "mmmm"
                    ) = Text(
                        Today(),
                        "mmmm"
                    )) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                )
            ),
    //Party,Status and date value selected--------------------------------------------------------------
            !IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && !IsBlank(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
            ),
//Party,ordervalue and date value selected--------------------------------------------------------------
            IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && !IsBlank(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
            ),
 //status,ordervalue and date value selected--------------------------------------------------------------
            !IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && !IsBlank(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && 'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
            ),
 //Party,ordervalue and status selected--------------------------------------------------------------
            !IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && IsBlank(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
            ),
        //all selected-------------------------------------------------------------
            !IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            If(
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "Today",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    IsToday('Created On') && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Week",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today()))) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Month",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (Text(
                        'Created On',
                        "mmmm"
                    ) = Text(
                        Today(),
                        "mmmm"
                    )) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                )
            ),
            !IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && !IsBlank(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate) && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(DateTo_5.SelectedDate) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
            )
        ),
        'Order List'.Type = "Secondary",
        If(
         //Date selected-----------------------------------------------------------------------
            (!IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate)),
            If(
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "Today",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    IsToday('Created On') && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Secondary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Week",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (DateValue('Created On') >= DateValue(Today()) - Weekday(Today()) + 2 && DateValue('Created On') <= DateValue(Today()) + (9 - Weekday(Today()))) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Primary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                ),
                radioDate_5.Selected.Value = "This Month",
                Filter(
                    OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                    (Text(
                        'Created On',
                        "mmmm"
                    ) = Text(
                        Today(),
                        "mmmm"
                    )) && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Secondary && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email'
                )
            ),
        //Party selected-----------------------------------------------------------------------
            IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Order From'.'Customer Code' = radioParty_1.Selected.'Customer Code' && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email' && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Secondary
            ),
        //Status selected-----------------------------------------------------------------------
            IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Order Status' = radioStatus_1.Selected.Value && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email' && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Secondary
            ),
        // total order amount ------------------------------------------------------
            IsBlank(radioDate_5.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioParty_1.SelectedText) && IsBlank(radioStatus_1.SelectedText) && !IsBlank(OrderValue_1.Text) && IsBlank(DateFrom_5.SelectedDate),
            Filter(
                OfflineOrderHeaderCollection,
                'Total Bill Amount' = Value(OrderValue_1.Text) && 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = radioSalesperson_5.Selected.'Primary Email' && 'Order Type' = 'Order Type Choice'.Secondary
            ),
        // Selected salesperson-------------------------
